title: Beginner Teacher
additional-note: This periodical published during the same time period as another quarterly publication with the same name from the Southern Baptist Convention.  However, the author of this renewed contribution, Mildred Speakes Edwards, was closely involved with the Church of the Nazarene, and we therefore presume that it is the Nazarene publication that ran her contribution, as it ran some of her later contributions in the 1950s.
